name: Duct Tape Wizard
description:
X - Fire

Space - Jump

Arrow Keys - Move

A rogue wizard fights against capitalism at the mall! Taping up aspects of this sanctum of capitalism, our wizard finds themselves with nothing but a forbidden spell of duct tape and a dream.

Made with:

Program/Design: Castor Empyrean#4217

Art/Design: Goshric#5798

Music/Sound: ivbrim#9760

Project Management: Jolith#2276
